data.title: Wednesday, Dec 1, 2021 – Ackerman, Oster & Eaton Interview
data.meta_description: Guitarist Will Ackerman, horn player Jeff Oster, and multi-instrumentalist Tom Eaton talk about their Grammy nominated album, Brothers. And we remember Joanne Shenandoah.
data.text:
Will Ackerman/Jeff Oster/Tom Eaton: The Sound of a Post Windham Hill World: The Echoes Interview & Joanne Shenandoah Remembered.

Guitarist Will Ackerman, founder of Windham Hill Records, horn player Jeff Oster, and multi-instrumentalist Tom Eaton, have gotten together on an album that might remind you of the halcyon days of Windham Hill Records. It’s called Brothers and the cover even has the signature look of Windham Hill. We talk to the three musicians about new age nostalgia.
